description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a search screen in a food delivery app. It includes UI elements such as a search TextField, tips, and recent searches with tags.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a styled search interface with recent search tags.

classes.name: _SearchTag
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing an individual search tag button with a label.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for SearchScreen or _SearchTag, creating the UI

methods.name: _SearchTag.build
methods.description: Builds the individual search tag UI component
